channel.title: Ipod touch.. Is it any good?
channel.description:
Well im thinking of either getting a drum kit or an ipod touch
Is the ipod touch any good?
I like the idea of the google maps thing like GPS but does it work on the street?
I wanted to get an iphone but then i found out how expensive they are..
So i thought ipod touch instead..
Anyone got one and would like to explain this stuff out?
Also i might get an iphone if i have enuf money :d [b]Please only post what to get if you actually have one.. People posting "it sucks" without actually have one is stupid.[/b]

item.title: Ipod touch.. Is it any good?
item.dc:creator: @Razr Razr
item.description:
@Razr wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:30, topic:232586”][quote author=Razr link=topic=306746.msg2461947#msg2461947 date=1222522641]
I see where ur getting at but mine was 250 at costco and I got it when it frat came out… And u can hack it it has Internet (which I’m using right now to post) youtube and a lot of cool features but some people have different opinionsthen others.
[/quote]

I’m talking about the iPod touch which I am on now. And just updated to 2.0 free which is cool cuz you have the appstore so yea I reccomend buying it

Are you on about the iphone 3g or ipod touch?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Ipod touch.. Is it any good?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I’d buy a cheaper media device and save a little while and buy the drum kit. Making music is a good thing, it can be relaxing, inspiring, plain fun, social improvement, etc… A drum kit adds more value to yourself, as a person.

item.source: Ipod touch.. Is it any good?

item.title: Ipod touch.. Is it any good?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

It’s shit. Only a retard would pay $200 more just to get a touch-screen.

An Archos or a Cowon could provide you with the exact same features and in a Open Source Linux-Environment. Unlike the iPhone shit where you need to import stuff through their shitty iTunes app, you can just use it as a portable harddrive.

It’s also amazingly much cheaper.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipod touch.. Is it any good?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Honestly, if you are just in it for the wifi internet, get a Nintendo DS for $119. You can play games, movies, music, have an IRC and AIM client, and even write your own programs for it as well.

The gps works only where there is wifi, but there is so many other things that are sexy.
